amendment.description: To subpoena certain Department of Defense documents and records.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1288 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 19.
Amendment SA 1288 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S412-416; text: CR S412-413) To subpoena certain Department of Defense documents and records.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1288 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1288 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 19.
